title: I have a question for about 80% of you
body:
How much Bronze 5 could a Bronze 5 scrub if a Bronze scrub could scrub Bronze 5?

*Side note* Bronze is such a weird word... Look at the spelling
Inb4riotdeletes

replies.body:
A Bronze 5 could scrub as much Bronze 5 as a scrub in Bronze 5 could scrub in Bronze 5

(_side note_ oce diamond is Korean bronze 5)
What's this about scrubbing bronze? Did you get yours dirty or something?
So many bronze on these forums man. Just asking them a question

Oh no worries I got you covered. My Mom is a metal parts and care specialist, she said baking soda and lemon juice should help. Mix with warm water and apply gently with a hand towel. Will have your Bronze go from 5 to 1 in seconds!
Hey man you forgot the aluminium.. Aluminium goes well with baking soda! Thanks man! 10/10  my bronze is dank at 420carrot
